partial_orders.reason: Both edits perform an identical structural operation - removing the exact same line 'vol.Optional(CONF_DEVICE_ID): selector.DeviceSelector(),' from schema definitions in different template component files. Both edits are part of the same refactoring operation to remove CONF_DEVICE_ID from template component schemas, making them part of a single contiguous micro-task with mirrored structural changes.
